free_traffic_desc:
We provide 5 GB of traffic for free every month, with no speed or feature limitations. Once the limit is reached, VPN access is paused.

To continue using the service, upgrade to Premium with unlimited traffic.

Please enter your email we will send you
password reset link to your email.

upgrade_for_unlimited: Upgrade to premium for unlimited access!
delete_confirm_desc: This action is permanent. Please enter your password to confirm.
faq_q1: How do I change my server location?
faq_a1: Go to the home screen and tap the flag icon or the 'Change Location' button.
faq_a2: Yes, we use military-grade encryption to ensure your data is safe.
faq_a3: Speed can be affected by your distance. Try connecting to a closer server.
faq_q4: Can I use this on multiple devices?
faq_a4: Yes, your subscription covers up to 5 devices simultaneously.

vmess_description: Enjoy reliable security with time-tested, stable, and reliable protection.
protocol_change_error: Please disconnect VPN before changing protocol
privacy_overview_desc: Tytan VPN is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.
privacy_info_collection_desc: We do not collect or log your browsing history, traffic destination, data content, or DNS queries. We collect minimal data necessary to maintain your account and provide services, such as your email address and basic device information.
privacy_data_usage_desc: Your data is used solely to provide and improve the Tytan VPN service. We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy_third_party_desc: Our service may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties.
privacy_security_measures_desc: We use industry-standard encryption and security protocols to protect your data while it is in transit through our VPN servers.
privacy_policy_changes_desc: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
terms_user_agreement_desc: By using Tytan VPN, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully to understand your rights and obligations.
terms_acceptance_desc: By accessing and using Tytan VPN, you express your agreement to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, you should not use the service.
terms_license_desc: We grant you a non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use Tytan VPN solely for your personal, non-commercial use on devices you own or control.
terms_prohibited_desc: You agree not to use the service for any illegal activities, including but not limited to copyright infringement, harassment, or spreading malware. Any violation may result in account termination.
terms_disclaimer_desc: Tytan VPN is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not warrant that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
terms_limitation_desc: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Tytan VPN shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use of the service.
terms_governing_law_desc: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the company is registered.
unlock_all_features_with_a_secure_accoun: Unlock all features with a secure account
